DOC.brief_summary: The objective study examine 5-year efficacy safety Matrix-Induced Autologous Chondrocyte Implantation ( MACI® Implant ) , compare arthroscopic microfracture , patient receive study treatment Genzyme-sponsored study MACI00206 [ NCT00719576 ] treatment symptomatic articular cartilage defect femoral condyle , include trochlea .
